attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am not anti religion, I am a spiritual man.
I am profoundly against the greed of it.
the adverts, the clamour for buy buy buy, has ruined it completely.
It is now merely a shopping festival, a greed festival.
The shops get so busy, the roads clogged, accidents, people go mad.
One can't go about ones normal life, the normal items get put away for 'seasonal' items in the shops for seasonal, read, useless items that get thrown away, quickly, how "green" is that?
All its for is to boost shop and company profits, cynically.
And the dreadful muzak every year too.
So do us a favour, end the Christmas festival and holiday once and for all and put us out of this misery.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
